Translations.Text: Steqsan k id $ef ooue. Ini: "ooue si lameo n Mass iw. Drus kan n tmusni i wen ippunefken
Ma ihwa ya£, a Nekkes ayen i k Nweeea. D$a ur teppafev, mgal a£, awkil
siwa aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, lfevl iS, i kecc, izga meqqweo
Ini: "lemmer ad mlilen imdanen akked leonun, iwakken a d awin am Leqwoan agi, ur d ppawin i t icban, xas maawanen
Ni$ Nefka d i imdanen, di Leqwoan agi, si yal imedyaten. Tegwti n yimdanen ur b$in, siwa tijehli
Nnan: "ur k neppamen alamma tesfeggvev a$ d a$balu, si tmurt
ne$, tesaiv leonan n tezdayin akked tfeooant, ideg feggven isaffen
ne$, a d tesse$liv igenni d ifeulan, akken i $ tzuxxev; ne$, a d tasev s Oebbi akked lmalayek, zdat nne
Ne$ a ppesauv axxam imzewweq, ne$ a ppaliv s igenni. Ur neppamen, s walluy ik, alamma tessersev ane$ d tazmamt ara n$eo". Ini: "gedha s Mass iw! Day lli$ d ayen nniven, siwa d amdan amazan
